content: I just can’t believe you bought him a beer! :~) I reckon you can’t make blanket policies or judgements about these sorts of situations, but I recall the words of Frantz Fanon, speaking about violence (and it’s worth keeping in mind that pinching someone’s butt is assault, however amusing to the male perpetrator/onlooker), that it is the only language the colonizer understands. In this case, for “colonizer”, read “male harasser”. I’m not sure Fanon is completely correct, but the point is well worth considering.
